entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
